name: Digital Health Citizen
memberOrga: only natural persons are allowed to be member
goal:
We are hosting a plattform where citizen can host their data, offering access to data as they want and can connect especially to health services and scientific research.
The activity is also empowering the citizen within the use of the personal data.
The association is a member driven, non-for-profit organisation.
interests: Digital economy and society, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Personalized Medicine, Open Science cloud and interoperability of health / life-style data
